keyMoments.title: Crew Works to Recover Their Treasure
keyMoments.description: The scattered Straw Hat crew members work independently but toward the common goal of recovering their treasure and escaping the G-8 Fortress.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to function effectively even when separated, trusting each other to complete their respective tasks.

keyMoments.title: Nami Saves Luffy from Seastone
keyMoments.description: When Luffy is trapped and helpless in a seastone net, Nami defeats the Marines and rescues him, allowing them to escape with the gold.
keyMoments.significance: Exemplifies the crew's interdependence and how they cover for each other's weaknesses. Nami's non-Devil Fruit combat abilities prove crucial.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates are trapped in the G-8 Marine Fortress after falling from Skypiea. Despite being separated and vastly outnumbered, the crew works together to recover their treasure and plan their escape.
currentObjective: Escape the G-8 Marine Fortress with their treasure and the Going Merry intact.
